title: Why isn't philosophy offered as a course at more U.S. high schools? - Quora

response.answer_text: My best guess would be because the social definition of the purpose of an education is to prepare on for employment. If this is true, then perhaps we haven't figured out how to connect the learning of philosophy to this goal. Causation is quite challenging though in this instance, as in perhaps any instance of trying to determine out the why's of certain things on the world.
